amendment.description: To include all of the 28 States originally on the National Park Service's list in the commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S13941-13942; text: CR S13942) To include all of the 28 States originally on the National Park Service's list in the commission.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2685 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Sarbanes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2685 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
